name: copilot-studio-assets-automation
title: Copilot Studio assets automation
shortDescription: Script prompt/import/export of embeddings, actions, prompt libraries.
longDescription: This sample automates the management of Copilot Studio assets, including the prompt, import, and export of embeddings, actions, and prompt libraries. It demonstrates how to use Microsoft Graph PowerShell and CLI for Microsoft 365 to streamline asset operations, making it easier to manage and deploy Copilot Studio resources efficiently.
